name: DreamOff
description:
After spending a day caring for the animals, the veterinarian in a nature reserve must go home and take shelter. 

It snows, it’s cold, it’s dark, and the voice of a mysterious ranger rings out on the radio.

Movement : ZQSD / WASD
Quit Game : Alt+F4 

Credits :
Level Designer & Game Dev - Theo Vicini 
Game Dev - Matthieu Osten
Sound Design - Chloé 
Artist  3D- Bruno Bracelli
Artist Shader & Vfx - Benjamin heink
Artist 2D - Julia Bofin
Artist Shader & Vfx - Agathe Roux
